text: The Toyota Camry (; Japanese: トヨタ・カムリ) is a car made by Toyota since 1980. The name "Camry" comes from the Japanese word kanmuri (冠, かんむり), which means "crown". ==Sales== The Camry is Toyota's best-selling car in the United States and is in the Top 5 best selling cars in the US. == References == Camry category:1980s automobiles category:1990s automobiles category:2000s automobiles category:Sedans category:Front wheel drive vehicles Category:2010s automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Toyota Camry
